questions.question: Which step should an ML engineer take using Amazon SageMaker Clarify to evaluate a binary classification model for explainability?
options: Use the SageMaker Clarify model explainability feature to identify the most influential features for the model's predictions.
Retrain the model using SageMaker Clarify to remove any potential bias.
Use the SageMaker Clarify bias detection feature to analyze the model's inputs, outputs, and metadata against known protected variables.
Use SageMaker Clarify to automatically fix any detected bias in the model.
correct_answers: Use the SageMaker Clarify model explainability feature to identify the most influential features for the model's predictions.
